entry.title: Learning Codeigniter 4 - Folder structure
entry.content:
Let’s go into a deap dive about the codeigniter folder structure.

Codeigniter
|-- App
|   |-- Config
|   |-- Controllers
|   |-- Database
|   |-- Filters
|   |-- Helpers
|   |-- Language
|   |-- Libraries
|   |-- Models
|   |-- ThirdParty
|   |-- Views
|-- Public
|-- System
|-- Tests
|-- Writable

This is the basic Codeigniter 4 structure. On this video you’ll learn all about it.
